entry.title: Sunday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
